(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NN Nothing) (RB quite))
    (VP (VBP like)
      (S
        (NP
          (NP (DT a) (NN cup))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (JJ hot) (NNP Teh) (NNP Halia))))
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB wash)
            (PRT (RP down))
            (NP (PDT all) (DT that) (NN oil))
            (PP (IN after)
              (S
                (VP (VBG eating)
                  (NP (NN stuff))
                  (PP (IN like)
                    (NP
                      (NP (NNP Nasi) (NNP Lemak))
                      (CC and)
                      (NP (NNP Nasi) (NNP Briyani)))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(like-3, Nothing-1)
advmod(Nothing-1, quite-2)
root(ROOT-0, like-3)
det(cup-5, a-4)
nsubj(wash-11, cup-5)
prep(cup-5, of-6)
amod(Halia-9, hot-7)
nn(Halia-9, Teh-8)
pobj(of-6, Halia-9)
aux(wash-11, to-10)
xcomp(like-3, wash-11)
prt(wash-11, down-12)
predet(oil-15, all-13)
det(oil-15, that-14)
dobj(wash-11, oil-15)
prep(wash-11, after-16)
pcomp(after-16, eating-17)
dobj(eating-17, stuff-18)
prep(eating-17, like-19)
nn(Lemak-21, Nasi-20)
pobj(like-19, Lemak-21)
cc(Lemak-21, and-22)
nn(Briyani-24, Nasi-23)
conj(Lemak-21, Briyani-24)

  (S
    (NP (DT the)
      (ADJP (JJ fat)
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP (DT the) (NN milk)))))
    (VP (VBZ binds)
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP
          (NP (NN capsaicin))
          (PRN (-LRB- -LRB-)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (NN substance))
              (PP (IN in)
                (NP
                  (NP (NNS chilli))
                  (SBAR
                    (WHNP (WDT that))
                    (S
                      (VP (VBZ causes)
                        (NP (DT that) (VBG burning) (NN sensation))))))))
            (-RRB- -RRB-))
          (SBAR
            (WHNP (WDT which))
            (S
              (VP (VBZ eases)
                (NP (DT the) (NN heat))))))))
    (, ,)))
